leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-分子动力学与力场生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 力场→模拟→分析→可视化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: MD引擎 + 势模型 + 分析

queries: [WEB] molecular dynamics trajectory analysis tools github
[WEB] python library for md analysis github
[WEB] molecular visualization software open source github
[WEB] calculate rdf msd molecular dynamics github

tools.name: molview
tools.one_line_profile: IPython/Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization based on Mol*
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that enables interactive molecular visualization within notebook environments, leveraging the Mol* (Molstar) viewer capabilities for rendering large-scale molecular data.

tools.name: MicrobeTrace
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization multitool for molecular epidemiology and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based visualization tool designed for molecular epidemiology, enabling the integration and exploration of contact tracing networks, genomic curves, and geographic data.

tools.name: ADplugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for AutoDock/Vina molecular docking setup and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that facilitates the setup, execution, and analysis of molecular docking simulations using AutoDock and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: Alphafold2import
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to fetch and import AlphaFold2 models
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that streamlines the process of fetching and importing predicted protein structures from the AlphaFold2 database hosted by EMBL.

tools.name: KinaseDocker2
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for kinase inhibitor binding and affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool integrated into PyMOL for predicting the binding modes and affinity of kinase inhibitors, utilizing a Docker-based backend for computation.

tools.name: PostSPH.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing library for DualSPHysics simulations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to facilitate the post-processing and analysis of Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) simulation data generated by DualSPHysics.

tools.name: cpptraj
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive trajectory analysis tool for Amber MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: The main trajectory analysis and data processing engine for the Amber molecular dynamics package, capable of handling various trajectory formats and performing a wide range of analyses.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols and analysis in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter Notebooks that function as a workflow tool for performing, visualizing, and analyzing molecular docking simulations interactively.

tools.name: shiny.molstar
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny wrapper for the Mol* molecular visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a Shiny widget for Mol*, enabling the integration of high-performance molecular visualization into R-based web applications and analysis pipelines.

tools.name: ArchaeoPhases
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing MCMC simulations for chronological modelling in archaeology
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis and post-processing of Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulations used in Bayesian chronological modeling for archaeology.

tools.name: NIMPHS
tools.one_line_profile: Blender add-on for manipulating and post-processing hydraulic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on designed to import, manipulate, and visualize hydraulic simulation data from solvers like OpenFOAM and TELEMAC within the Blender 3D environment.

tools.name: molecular-design-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook-integrated tools for molecular simulation and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to make molecular simulation and visualization accessible within Jupyter notebooks, often used for educational and prototyping purposes in molecular design.

tools.name: notebook-molecular-visualization
tools.one_line_profile: 2D and 3D molecular visualization in Jupyter notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling 2D and 3D visualization of molecules directly within Jupyter notebooks, utilizing 3Dmol.js and D3.js backends.

tools.name: PyMOL-PUB
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for generating publication-quality structure figures
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to automate and simplify the creation of high-quality, publication-ready molecular structure images.

tools.name: PyMolSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for computing molecular features and predicting activities
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolkit for Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) studies, enabling the computation of molecular features and prediction of biological activities.

tools.name: hop
tools.one_line_profile: Solvent network analysis tool based on MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package built on MDAnalysis for analyzing solvation dynamics and solvent networks in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: imdclient
tools.one_line_profile: Client for streaming analysis from running MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing real-time streaming analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, interfacing with MD engines that support interactive MD (IMD).

tools.name: propkatraj
tools.one_line_profile: pKa estimates for proteins using an ensemble approach on trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool that calculates pKa values for protein residues across a molecular dynamics trajectory, providing ensemble-averaged estimates.

tools.name: zarrtraj
tools.one_line_profile: MDAKit for handling Zarr-based trajectories in MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: An extension (MDAKit) for MDAnalysis that enables reading and writing molecular dynamics trajectories in the Zarr format, facilitating efficient data access.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Selection And Prediction tools for structural datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for quickly analyzing and visualizing datasets of crystal or molecular structures, often used for machine learning potentials and structural descriptors.

tools.name: ring-pymol
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for Residue Interaction Network Generator (RING)
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that visualizes residue interaction networks (RING) in protein structures, helping to identify non-covalent interactions.

tools.name: domhmm
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify nano- and microdomains in membrane MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A package for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations of bio-membranes to identify and characterize lipid domains using Hidden Markov Models.

tools.name: Jmol-SwingJS
tools.one_line_profile: SwingJS-compatible port of Jmol/JSmol for molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A version of the Jmol molecular visualization toolkit compatible with SwingJS, allowing Java-based molecular analysis tools to run in web environments.

tools.name: Molecules
tools.one_line_profile: Open source 3-D molecular visualizer for iOS
tools.detailed_description: A mobile application for iOS devices that allows users to view and manipulate 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: MoleculesMac
tools.one_line_profile: macOS version of the Molecules molecular visualizer
tools.detailed_description: The macOS desktop version of the Molecules application for 3D molecular visualization.

tools.name: MolecularNodes
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for molecular animations in Blender using Geometry Nodes
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that enables the import and high-quality rendering of molecular dynamics trajectories and structures using Blender's Geometry Nodes system.

tools.name: Caleydo
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization framework for molecular biology data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization framework focused on the exploration and analysis of complex molecular biology data, including gene expression and pathways.

tools.name: StructureAnalyzer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing 3D protein structures to generate 2D binding motifs
tools.detailed_description: A program that processes 3D protein structure files (PDB) to identify and generate 2D representations of binding motifs.

tools.name: DuIvyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to process and visualize GROMACS MD simulation results
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools designed to assist in the post-processing and visualization of molecular dynamics simulations performed with GROMACS.

tools.name: colvars
tools.one_line_profile: Collective variables library for molecular simulation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software module that implements collective variables and enhanced sampling methods for molecular dynamics simulations, compatible with multiple MD engines (NAMD, LAMMPS, GROMACS).

tools.name: MDBrushAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analyzing MD simulations of polymer brushes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library specifically designed for parsing LAMMPS data and post-processing molecular dynamics simulations of polymer brushes in equilibrium with solvent vapours.

tools.name: phlower
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis using Hodge decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that applies Hodge decomposition techniques to analyze trajectories, likely in the context of biological or molecular dynamics data.

tools.name: pymol-remote
tools.one_line_profile: Remote control interface for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows sending data to and controlling a local PyMOL instance from a remote server, facilitating workflows that combine remote computing (e.g., deep learning) with local visualization.

tools.name: cuemol2
tools.one_line_profile: CueMol molecular visualization framework
tools.detailed_description: A molecular visualization framework designed to display and analyze macromolecular structures.

tools.name: SFG-spectra-tool
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to compute SFG spectra from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A program that calculates Sum-Frequency Generation (SFG) spectra for interfacial water molecules from molecular dynamics trajectories, supporting various interface geometries.

tools.name: msys
tools.one_line_profile: Library for preparation and analysis of MD systems
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by D. E. Shaw Research for the preparation, manipulation, and analysis of chemical systems for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Project-Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Automation toolkit for ANSYS CFD simulation and data processing
tools.detailed_description: An all-in-one solution for automating Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations, data processing, and post-processing specifically designed for ANSYS 2020 R1.

tools.name: biobox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for manipulation and analysis of molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for the manipulation, modelling, and analysis of molecular structures, facilitating structural biology workflows.

tools.name: vmd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD)
tools.detailed_description: An installable Python module that provides an interface to VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics), allowing for scriptable molecular visualization and analysis within Python environments.

tools.name: PathCV
tools.one_line_profile: Path collective variable implementation for PLUMED
tools.detailed_description: Source code implementation of the Path collective variable for the PLUMED software, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations along specific reaction pathways.

tools.name: PINES
tools.one_line_profile: Permutationally invariant networks for enhanced sampling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Permutationally Invariant Networks for Enhanced Sampling (PINES), a method for discovering collective variables in molecular dynamics.

tools.name: PROPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse problem solver for material parameter estimation
tools.detailed_description: An interface tool that couples simulation models with optimization algorithms to solve the inverse problem of material parameter estimation, supporting pre- and post-processing.

tools.name: BLOCKING
tools.one_line_profile: Error analysis tool for MD simulation convergence
tools.detailed_description: Tools for assessing the convergence of Molecular Dynamics simulations by performing error analysis on calculated ensemble averages and free energies using blocking methods.

tools.name: F4Enix
tools.one_line_profile: API for parsing and post-processing Monte Carlo simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python API designed for parsing and post-processing various file formats related to Monte Carlo (MC) simulations, specifically in the context of fusion energy research.

tools.name: OrcaFOWT
tools.one_line_profile: Automation API for OrcaFlex FOWT simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python API wrapper for OrcaFlex to automate pre- and post-processing of Floating Offshore Wind Turbine (FOWT) simulations.

tools.name: GEMDAT
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for molecular dynamics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit specifically designed for the analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, providing utilities for trajectory processing and property calculation.

tools.name: gis4wrf
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS toolkit for WRF model pre/post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A QGIS plugin that provides tools for pre-processing, running, and post-processing/visualizing simulations from the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model.

tools.name: global-chem
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical knowledge graph and molecular definitions
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph linking common chemical names to their molecular definitions (SMILES, SMARTS), provided as a Python package for chemoinformatics tasks.

tools.name: conan
tools.one_line_profile: Contact analysis tool for MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing inter-atomic contacts in molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for understanding molecular interactions and stability.

tools.name: MD-IFP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand Interaction Fingerprints from MD
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating and analyzing protein-ligand Interaction Fingerprints (IFP) from molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: ASER
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale eventuality knowledge graph
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale weighted knowledge graph focusing on activities, states, events, and their relations, useful for commonsense reasoning and AI research.

tools.name: SiteAF3
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular interaction modeling platform based on AlphaFold3
tools.detailed_description: A platform leveraging AlphaFold3 for predicting and analyzing molecular interactions across various receptor-ligand combinations.

tools.name: mdgo
tools.one_line_profile: MD simulation setup and analysis codebase
tools.detailed_description: A Python codebase designed to facilitate the setup of classical molecular dynamics simulations and the subsequent analysis of results.

tools.name: MDANSE
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Dynamics Analysis for Neutron Scattering
tools.detailed_description: A software package for analyzing Molecular Dynamics simulations specifically to compute observables relevant to neutron scattering experiments.

tools.name: poreFoam-singlePhase
tools.one_line_profile: Pore-scale flow simulation and processing tools
tools.detailed_description: A set of codes for direct single-phase flow simulation in porous media, including pre- and post-processing utilities, likely based on OpenFOAM.

tools.name: CRISP
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced post-processing for ASE workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to enhance Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) workflows with advanced post-processing capabilities for molecular simulations.

tools.name: MAYA
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical multiverse generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A module integrating multiple molecular representations to generate chemical spaces for analyzing structure-multiple activity relationships.

tools.name: Correlation
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for material correlation functions (RDF, PDF, PAD)
tools.detailed_description: A program to calculate Radial Distribution Function (RDF), Pair Distribution Function (g(r)), and Plane Angle Distribution (PAD) for material analysis.

tools.name: metadynminer.py
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Plumed metadynamics HILLS files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for efficient reading, analysis, and visualization of HILLS files generated by Plumed metadynamics simulations.

tools.name: WaterNetworkAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Conserved water search and analysis from MD
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for preparing inputs and analyzing conserved water networks from molecular dynamics trajectories (GROMACS, AMBER).

tools.name: trajr
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis library for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis of animal movement trajectories, providing functions for calculating speed, acceleration, and other kinematic parameters.

tools.name: PymolFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein folding simulation plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that allows for the visualization and simulation of protein folding processes directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: VDOS
tools.one_line_profile: Vibrational Density of States calculator from MD
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to calculate the Vibrational Density of States (VDOS) from molecular dynamics trajectory files, supporting multiple formats.

tools.name: VaSP
tools.one_line_profile: Vascular fluid-structure-interaction simulation tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for pre-processing, simulating, and post-processing vascular fluid-structure-interaction (FSI) problems.

tools.name: MolDynPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting tool for molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating plots from molecular dynamics simulation data, configured via YAML and powered by matplotlib.

tools.name: asent
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient sentiment analysis library using spaCy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing efficient and transparent sentiment analysis, often used in social science research and text analysis.

tools.name: Kitware Glance
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based scientific visualization application
tools.detailed_description: An open-source web application for visualizing volumetric images, molecular structures, and geometric objects, part of the ParaView/VTK ecosystem.

tools.name: viscosity_md
tools.one_line_profile: NEMD viscosity calculation workflow
tools.detailed_description: Code for running Non-Equilibrium Molecular Dynamics (NEMD) simulations on LAMMPS and post-processing the results to compute viscosity.

tools.name: sitator
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised landmark analysis for MD jump detection
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised landmark analysis to detect jumps and diffusion events in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Chem4D
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization plugin for Cinema 4D
tools.detailed_description: A Python plugin to visualize molecules within Cinema 4D, enabling high-quality scientific animation and illustration.

tools.name: PyBILT
tools.one_line_profile: Lipid bilayer analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to aid in the analysis of lipid bilayer molecular simulation trajectories, offering specialized functions for membrane properties.

tools.name: BakerLab PyMOL Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of PyMOL scripts from the Baker Lab for protein structure visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various PyMOL scripts used by the Baker Lab, facilitating tasks such as structure coloring, alignment, and image generation for protein design and structural biology.

tools.name: MDAPackmol
tools.one_line_profile: MDAnalysis wrapper for the Packmol software to generate initial simulation configurations
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around the Packmol package, integrated with MDAnalysis, allowing users to create initial configurations for molecular dynamics simulations by packing molecules into defined regions.

tools.name: MDAnalysisData
tools.one_line_profile: Standard datasets for molecular dynamics analysis and testing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing programmatic access to a curated collection of molecular dynamics trajectories and structures, used for testing, benchmarking, and teaching MDAnalysis workflows.

tools.name: RotamerConvolveMD
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of MD trajectories for DEER experiment interpretation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories or conformational ensembles to calculate spin-label distances, aiding in the interpretation of Double Electron-Electron Resonance (DEER) experiments.

tools.name: mdacli
tools.one_line_profile: Command line interface for MDAnalysis functionality
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that exposes MDAnalysis capabilities, allowing users to perform common trajectory analysis tasks without writing Python scripts.

tools.name: mdahole2
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the HOLE program to analyze pore dimensions
tools.detailed_description: An MDAnalysis toolkit that provides a Python interface to the HOLE program, used for analyzing the dimensions and pore profiles of ion channels and transmembrane proteins in MD trajectories.

tools.name: MDAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A widely used object-oriented Python library to analyze trajectories from molecular dynamics simulations. It supports many popular file formats (GROMACS, AMBER, CHARMM, etc.) and provides tools for distance calculation, alignment, and custom analysis.

tools.name: membrane-curvature
tools.one_line_profile: MDAnalysis tool to calculate membrane curvature from simulations
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool within the MDAnalysis ecosystem for calculating and mapping the curvature of lipid membranes in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pmda
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel algorithms for MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: A library that implements parallel versions of analysis algorithms for MDAnalysis, leveraging Dask to accelerate the processing of large molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: transport-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of transport properties in molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package based on MDAnalysis to compute transport properties such as diffusion coefficients and ionic conductivity from molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: waterdynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of water dynamics and interactions in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing the dynamical properties of water molecules, such as hydrogen bond lifetimes and reorientation times, within molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for digital signal processing and parameter estimation, including methods like ARMA, SSA, EMD, and DMD, applicable to time-series data analysis in physics and engineering.

tools.name: pytim
tools.one_line_profile: Interfacial analysis of molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the identification and analysis of fluid interfaces in molecular simulations, supporting various methods for intrinsic surface analysis.

tools.name: GetBox-PyMOL-Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for calculating docking boxes
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that calculates and visualizes the docking search space (box) coordinates for docking software like LeDock, AutoDock, and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: MobilityDB
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial trajectory data management and analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: An extension for PostgreSQL and PostGIS that adds support for temporal and spatio-temporal objects, enabling the storage and analysis of geospatial trajectory data.

tools.name: ili
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization of molecular maps in 2D and 3D
tools.detailed_description: A web application for the interactive visualization of spatial molecular data (molecular cartography) on 2D images or 3D models.

tools.name: pymolshortcuts
tools.one_line_profile: Productivity enhancements and shortcuts for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A library of shortcuts and extended functions for PyMOL, designed to streamline molecular visualization workflows and enable web searches directly from the PyMOL interface.

tools.name: lindemann
tools.one_line_profile: Calculate Lindemann index from LAMMPS trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to calculate the Lindemann index, a measure of thermal agitation and melting, from molecular dynamics trajectories generated by LAMMPS.

tools.name: Avogadro
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced molecular editor and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform molecular editor and visualization tool designed for computational chemistry, molecular modeling, bioinformatics, and materials science.

tools.name: Avogadro Libraries
tools.one_line_profile: Core libraries for the Avogadro molecular modeling platform
tools.detailed_description: The backend libraries for Avogadro, providing 3D rendering, chemical data processing, and analysis capabilities for molecular science applications.

tools.name: trajan
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis package for oceanography and drift simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing simulated and observed trajectories, primarily used in oceanography and drift modeling (e.g., with OpenDrift).

tools.name: OTAnalytics
tools.one_line_profile: Traffic analysis tool for road user trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for performing traffic analysis on trajectories of road users, supporting the processing of data from traffic cameras and simulations.

tools.name: PedPy
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of pedestrian dynamics from trajectory files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing pedestrian dynamics, calculating metrics like density, velocity, and flow from trajectory data, used in crowd safety and evacuation research.

tools.name: CoronaDash
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for COVID-19 spread forecasting and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny-based dashboard application for visualizing COVID-19 trajectories, performing cluster analysis, and forecasting spread using epidemiological models.

tools.name: molorbdraw
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for molecular orbitals from cube files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to visualize molecular orbitals directly from cube files, facilitating the analysis of electronic structures in quantum chemistry.

tools.name: plumed2-mcp-server
tools.one_line_profile: AI-assisted input generator for PLUMED2 enhanced sampling
tools.detailed_description: An MCP-based assistant that automatically generates and validates optimized PLUMED input files for molecular dynamics enhanced sampling methods like metadynamics and umbrella sampling.

tools.name: Prolint2
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of lipid-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: An optimized tool for analyzing and visualizing lipid-protein interactions from molecular dynamics trajectories, providing metrics on contact duration and lipid specificity.

tools.name: Pymol-script-repo
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts extending PyMOL functionality
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository of scripts for PyMOL, acting as a library of extensions for structural biology visualization and analysis tasks.

tools.name: MD-TASK
tools.one_line_profile: Network analysis and perturbation response scanning for MD
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories using graph theory (network analysis) and Perturbation Response Scanning (PRS) to identify allosteric communication pathways.

tools.name: RadialDistributionFunction
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance RDF calculation utility
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated utility for computing the Radial Distribution Function (RDF) from particle position files, supporting N-body or neighbor list methods.

tools.name: cylindr
tools.one_line_profile: Cylindrical distribution function calculator for MD
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for calculating cylindrical distribution functions from molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for analyzing liquid crystals or cylindrical geometries.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for solid-state defect calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the generation, pre/post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations in solids, streamlining workflows for DFT codes like VASP.

tools.name: CACTUS-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/post-processing tools for CACTUS turbine simulations
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for geometry generation and result analysis for CACTUS (Code for Axial and Cross-flow TUrbine Simulation), developed by Sandia National Labs.

tools.name: kuibit
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing library for Einstein Toolkit simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing and visualizing numerical relativity simulations performed with the Einstein Toolkit.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D XFEM solver for fracture mechanics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: htp_md
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput molecular dynamics analysis infrastructure
tools.detailed_description: A library for trajectory analysis and infrastructure development for high-throughput molecular dynamics, developed by Toyota Research Institute.

tools.name: cavity-md-ipi
tools.one_line_profile: Cavity molecular dynamics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A code implementation for cavity molecular dynamics simulations (vibrational strong coupling), including job submission and post-processing tools.

tools.name: MDV
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Dimensional Visualization for spatial and molecular data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit for analyzing and visualizing spatial and molecular datasets, supporting multi-dimensional data representation.

tools.name: VisualFactory
tools.one_line_profile: Cinematic molecular visualization scripts
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to produce high-quality, cinematic visualizations of molecular systems, bridging scientific accuracy with visual impact.

tools.name: Coffee-mill
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Dynamics Trajectory Analysis Tools
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and toolset for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories, providing efficient implementations of common analysis algorithms.

tools.name: snowtools
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/post-processing for SURFEX-Crocus snow models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for handling data related to the SURFEX-Crocus snow model simulations, developed by CNRM (Meteo France).

tools.name: moly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular visualization with Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that leverages Plotly to create interactive 3D visualizations of molecules and atomic structures.

tools.name: AMDock
tools.one_line_profile: Assisted molecular docking interface for AutoDock
tools.detailed_description: A graphical and command-line tool to assist in molecular docking workflows using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina, simplifying preparation and analysis.

tools.name: AMDock-win
tools.one_line_profile: Assisted molecular docking interface (Windows version)
tools.detailed_description: Windows version of AMDock, a tool for assisted molecular docking with AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: Vts.MonteCarlo
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo simulations for photonics
tools.detailed_description: Command-line applications for running and post-processing Monte Carlo simulations of light transport in tissues, part of the Virtual Tissue Simulator (VTS) project.

tools.name: VMD-SignalProcessing
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Mode Decomposition algorithm implementation
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD), a signal processing technique for decomposing signals into band-limited modes. (Note: Distinct from Visual Molecular Dynamics).

tools.name: AlphaFold3_Result_Visualize
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for AlphaFold 3 predictions
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize AlphaFold 3 protein structure prediction results using PyMOL and matplotlib, facilitating the interpretation of PAE and pLDDT metrics.

tools.name: FastMDAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis software for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to automate the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, providing tools for processing and extracting insights from simulation data.

tools.name: CHAPERONg
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for GROMACS MD simulations and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline designed to streamline GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations and subsequent trajectory analyses, facilitating high-throughput simulation workflows.

tools.name: DynaPhoPy
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon anharmonicity analysis from molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A software to calculate phonon properties and anharmonicity from molecular dynamics simulations, allowing for the analysis of thermal properties and lattice dynamics.

tools.name: topotools
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for manipulating topology information
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) that provides commands to manipulate topology information, such as bonds, angles, dihedrals, and impropers, useful for building and modifying simulation systems.

tools.name: atomify
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time molecular dynamics in the browser using LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables running and visualizing real-time molecular dynamics simulations directly in a web browser, leveraging LAMMPS for the simulation engine.

tools.name: TIMEOR
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory Inference and Mechanism Exploration with Omics Data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for trajectory inference and mechanism exploration using multi-omics data, facilitating the analysis of dynamic biological processes.

tools.name: Coupling_ABAQUS_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for coupling ABAQUS and MATLAB for Software-in-the-Loop simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework enabling the interconnection of ABAQUS (Finite Element Analysis) and MATLAB for closed-loop simulations and structural optimization tasks.

tools.name: st-speckmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for Speck molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit component that integrates the Speck renderer to create high-quality ambient occlusion visualizations of molecular structures within web applications.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality molecular rendering using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to produce high-quality, aesthetic renderings of atoms and molecular structures for scientific publications and presentations.

tools.name: pydiffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Rotational Diffusion Tensor analysis from MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing the rotational diffusion tensor of molecules from molecular dynamics simulation trajectories.

tools.name: ammolite
tools.one_line_profile: Visualize Biotite structure data with PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that acts as a bridge between the Biotite bioinformatics library and PyMOL, enabling visualization of Biotite structure objects.

tools.name: mdgen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative modeling of molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A library for generative modeling of molecular dynamics trajectories, using machine learning techniques to simulate or augment MD data.

tools.name: site-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of site occupations in MD simulations of crystalline materials
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations of crystalline materials by tracking site occupations, useful for studying diffusion and ion transport.

tools.name: CMacIonize
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo photoionization and radiation hydrodynamics code
tools.detailed_description: A C++ code for performing Monte Carlo photoionization and radiation hydrodynamics simulations, used in astrophysics and plasma physics.

tools.name: rdfpy
tools.one_line_profile: Fast computation of 2D and 3D radial distribution functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed for the fast computation of 2D and 3D radial distribution functions (RDFs) from particle coordinates.

tools.name: blacklight
tools.one_line_profile: General Relativistic ray tracing for GRMHD post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A general relativistic ray tracing code designed for post-processing General Relativistic Magnetohydrodynamics (GRMHD) simulation data to generate images and spectra.

tools.name: MDSAPT
tools.one_line_profile: SAPT energy calculator using MDAnalysis and Psi4
tools.detailed_description: A tool that calculates Symmetry-Adapted Perturbation Theory (SAPT) interaction energies for structures derived from molecular dynamics trajectories, interfacing MDAnalysis with Psi4.

tools.name: pymol-color-alphafold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL extension to color AlphaFold structures by confidence
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that colors AlphaFold-predicted protein structures based on the per-residue confidence score (pLDDT), aiding in structure quality assessment.

tools.name: Atomic
tools.one_line_profile: Modern molecular visualizer for macOS and iOS
tools.detailed_description: A molecular visualization application designed for macOS and iOS, allowing users to view and interact with molecular structures.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction Fingerprints generator for protein-ligand complexes and MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes, capable of analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories to capture dynamic interaction profiles.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AI-enhanced ab initio computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that integrates artificial intelligence with ab initio methods to facilitate computational chemistry research, streamlining workflows for simulation and modeling.

tools.name: moldr
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold optimization for linear dimensionality reduction of MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing linear dimensionality reduction on molecular dynamics trajectories using manifold optimization techniques to extract essential dynamics.

tools.name: ipymd
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis of Molecular Dynamics output in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling the visualization and analysis of molecular dynamics simulation outputs directly within the IPython/Jupyter Notebook environment.

tools.name: Radial_Distribution_Function_rdf
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of Radial Distribution Functions (RDF) for molecular systems
tools.detailed_description: A script/tool for calculating the Radial Distribution Function (RDF) from molecular simulation data, a key metric for understanding structural properties.

tools.name: PyMOL4Win
tools.one_line_profile: Open source binary distribution of PyMOL for Windows
tools.detailed_description: Provides pre-compiled open-source versions of the PyMOL molecular visualization system specifically for Windows users.

tools.name: PyMOLfold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for protein sequence folding prediction
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that allows users to predict and fold protein sequences directly within the visualization environment.

tools.name: amof
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Molecular Dynamics trajectories for amorphous MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories of amorphous Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs).

tools.name: AHoJ-project
tools.one_line_profile: Search tool for APO/HOLO protein structure pairs
tools.detailed_description: A webserver and command-line tool for identifying and aligning APO (unbound) protein structures with their corresponding HOLO (bound) forms.

tools.name: MolArt
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure annotator and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript-based tool for annotating and visualizing molecular structures, often used for web-based structural biology applications.

tools.name: ipymol
tools.one_line_profile: Control PyMOL sessions via IPython/Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that acts as a bridge to control PyMOL visualization sessions programmatically from an IPython or Jupyter environment.

tools.name: RMD_Digging
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/post-processing tools for ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit for processing ReaxFF simulations, including force field parameter formatting, statistical analysis of structures/trajectories, and visualization output.

tools.name: MDSynthesis
tools.one_line_profile: Logistics and persistence engine for MD trajectory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a framework for managing, storing, and analyzing molecular dynamics simulation data and trajectories.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed to generate accurate many-body potential energy surfaces and perform molecular dynamics simulations using neural networks.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-Charge Dependent London Dispersion Correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable implementation of the D4 London dispersion correction for density functional theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: hotspot3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D hotspot mutation proximity analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing the spatial proximity of mutations in 3D protein structures to identify mutational hotspots.

tools.name: md-davis
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of protein MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories of proteins, offering various metrics and visualization capabilities.

tools.name: show_contacts
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL Plugin for displaying polar contacts
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that enhances the visualization of polar contacts and interactions within molecular structures.

tools.name: funnel_maker
tools.one_line_profile: Setup scripts for funnel metadynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts to set up funnel metadynamics simulations for protein-ligand binding studies using PLUMED and OpenMM.

tools.name: WHAM
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Weighted Histogram Analysis Method (WHAM) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A multithreaded Rust implementation of the Weighted Histogram Analysis Method (WHAM) for post-processing umbrella sampling MD simulations to calculate free energy profiles.

tools.name: OrbitalTrajectories.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Orbital trajectory design and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for designing, optimizing, and analyzing spacecraft orbits and transfers using high-performance astrodynamical simulations.

tools.name: LANLGeoMag
tools.one_line_profile: Library for magnetic-field models and coordinate transforms
tools.detailed_description: A C-based library providing magnetic field models and tools for geophysical research, including coordinate conversions and field line tracing.

tools.name: contact_map
tools.one_line_profile: Contact map analysis for biomolecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool based on MDTraj for calculating and analyzing contact maps of biomolecules from molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: FUSCA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Unified Single-Cell Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software package for single-cell data analysis, including modules for reconstructing cell trajectories and inferring intercellular communication networks.

tools.name: gmx-vmd-mcp
tools.one_line_profile: MCP service for controlling GROMACS and VMD
tools.detailed_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) service that enables AI agents to interact with and control GROMACS simulations and VMD visualization sessions.

tools.name: DistFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Distribution power flow equation solver
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB function that solves distribution power flow equations for radial, single-phase distribution networks.

tools.name: encore
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble comparison and analysis for MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: An extension to the MDAnalysis library for analyzing structural ensembles, including covariance matrices, similarity metrics, and PCA.

tools.name: interfacemd
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for MD simulations of aqueous systems
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing molecular dynamics data, specializing in aqueous systems and interfaces, with support for Amber, Gromacs, and CP2K.

tools.name: matlab_trajectory_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Robotics trajectory analysis and transformation tools
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for the display, analysis, and transformation of trajectories, primarily used in robotics and navigation research.

tools.name: plotpal
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing plotting tools for Dedalus simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for visualizing and plotting results from Dedalus, a framework for solving partial differential equations in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: my_roms_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/post-processing toolkit for ROMS ocean modeling
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit for pre-processing and post-processing data for the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS).

tools.name: PoincareMaps
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic geometry method for single-cell trajectory discovery
tools.detailed_description: A computational method using Poincaré maps and hyperbolic geometry to discover hierarchies and trajectories in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: GRADE
tools.one_line_profile: Clathrate hydrate structure determination and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A code to determine clathrate hydrate structures and analyze their evolution in molecular dynamics trajectories, including cage identification.

tools.name: qc_pymol
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for visualizing quantum chemistry results in PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to facilitate the visualization of quantum chemistry calculation results using PyMOL.

tools.name: ferritin
tools.one_line_profile: Protein utilities library in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing utilities for working with protein structures and data, suitable for bioinformatics applications.

tools.name: confined-water-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of confined water MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: Scripts to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories of water confined in nanotubes or between flat sheets (graphene, hBN).

tools.name: structurework
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for molecular structure analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of programs and scripts for analyzing molecular structures, useful for structural biology tasks.

tools.name: MD_ligand_receptor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing ligand-receptor interactions from MD
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for analyzing non-covalent ligand-receptor interactions in 3D structures derived from molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: vmd_density_profile
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing 1-D atomic densities
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin/script for computing 1-D atomic density profiles from macromolecular simulations.

tools.name: vmd_diffusion_coefficient
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing diffusion coefficients
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin/script for calculating diffusion coefficients from macromolecular simulation trajectories.

tools.name: vmd_plumed
tools.one_line_profile: PLUMED-GUI plugin for VMD to visualize free energy surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) software that provides a graphical user interface for PLUMED, enabling the visualization and analysis of free energy surfaces and collective variables directly within VMD.

tools.name: freud
tools.one_line_profile: Powerful and efficient particle trajectory analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics and particle simulation trajectories. It provides efficient, parallelized implementations of standard analysis methods such as correlation functions, order parameters, and clustering, designed for high-performance scientific computing.

tools.name: mdciao
tools.one_line_profile: Accessible analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics simulations, focusing on residue-residue interactions, contact maps, and other structural properties, with a user-friendly interface.

tools.name: md-analysis-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories using VMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python and Tcl scripts for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories, specifically designed to work with VMD. It includes tools for calculating various structural and dynamic properties.

tools.name: GRO2LAM
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from GROMACS to LAMMPS simulation formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to convert molecular dynamics simulation files from GROMACS format to LAMMPS format, facilitating interoperability between these two major simulation engines.

tools.name: aselektriskbureau
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions and tools for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software tools and scripts built around the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and VASP, providing enhanced functionality for setting up, running, and analyzing atomistic simulations.

tools.name: esigen
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for computational chemistry supporting information documents
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automates the generation of supporting information (SI) documents for computational chemistry publications, extracting data from output files of various quantum chemistry packages.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface that integrates the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling machine learning-driven molecular dynamics simulations and energy calculations.

tools.name: matterviz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive browser visualizations for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization library for materials science data, including periodic tables, 3D crystal structures, molecular dynamics trajectories, and various statistical plots (heatmaps, scatter plots).

tools.name: pymolprobity
tools.one_line_profile: MolProbity-style visualization plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that allows users to visualize MolProbity structural validation data (such as clash scores and geometry issues) directly on the protein structure within the PyMOL interface.

tools.name: amaceing_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating inputs and analyzing ML-potential simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the creation of input files for various simulation codes (CP2K, MACE, SevenNet) and to post-process and evaluate the results of these simulations, particularly focusing on machine learning potentials.

tools.name: vasp-interactive
tools.one_line_profile: ASE compliant Python interface to VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an ASE-compliant interface to the VASP (Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package) code, enabling users to drive VASP calculations and analyze results programmatically within the ASE framework.

tools.name: transport-coefficients-MSD
tools.one_line_profile: Compute Onsager transport coefficients from MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A code repository for calculating Onsager transport coefficients from molecular dynamics simulation data using mean-square displacements (MSD), useful for studying diffusion and transport in materials.

tools.name: nMOLDYN3
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Molecular Dynamics trajectories (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A classic software package for the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, particularly focusing on neutron scattering observables and other time-dependent correlation functions.

tools.name: AtomisticReverseMonteCarlo
tools.one_line_profile: OVITO Python modifier for Reverse Monte Carlo generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python modifier for the OVITO visualization software that generates bulk crystal structures with target Warren-Cowley parameters using an Atomistic Reverse Monte Carlo (RMC) algorithm.

tools.name: WarrenCowleyParameters
tools.one_line_profile: OVITO Python modifier to compute Warren-Cowley parameters for alloy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python modifier for the OVITO visualization software that calculates Warren-Cowley parameters, which are used to quantify short-range order and chemical ordering in multi-component alloys from atomistic simulation data.

tools.name: helinoise
tools.one_line_profile: Rotor noise prediction framework using PSU-WOPWOP and CAMRAD II
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing framework designed to predict helicopter rotor noise by interfacing CAMRAD II simulation results with the PSU-WOPWOP acoustic prediction code.

tools.name: chemkit
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for molecular modelling, cheminformatics and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library designed for molecular modeling, cheminformatics, and molecular visualization, providing algorithms and data structures for chemical data processing.

tools.name: ase_exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic exploration planning based on forward simulation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for robotic exploration planning that utilizes forward simulation to optimize trajectories and sensor placement for autonomous mapping and navigation.

tools.name: molecular_data_explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Web app generator for visualizing molecular data and geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that creates Dash-based web applications for the interactive visualization of molecular data and geometries, facilitating the exploration of chemical datasets.

tools.name: vitruvio
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for rapid leg design analysis and optimization for legged robots
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework for the early-stage design, analysis, and optimization of legged robots, computing necessary joint speeds, torques, and energy for trajectory tracking.

tools.name: mol-draw
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight 3D molecular viewer for web applications
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript/PureScript library for rendering 3D molecular structures in web applications, suitable for embedding molecular visualizations.

tools.name: stk-vis
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform application for visualization of molecular databases
tools.detailed_description: A desktop application designed for the visualization and exploration of large molecular databases, supporting the analysis of generated chemical structures.

tools.name: VASP_MD_XDAT
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for VASP MD trajectories (XDATCAR)
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran code for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories from VASP (XDATCAR files), calculating lattice parameters, RMSD, coordination numbers, and converting formats.

tools.name: MolSimToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia toolkit for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools written in Julia for the analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, providing efficient routines for trajectory processing and structural analysis.

tools.name: maicos
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of molecular dynamics simulations for interfacial and confined systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations specifically focusing on interfacial and confined systems, offering tools for density profiles, dielectric constants, and more.

tools.name: Dynamics
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for molecular dynamics visualization
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that facilitates the loading, viewing, and analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories directly within PyMOL.

tools.name: mcse
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Crystal Simulation Library for structure manipulation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for manipulating and analyzing molecular crystal structures, useful for crystallography and materials science simulations.

tools.name: pywindow
tools.one_line_profile: Structural analysis of discrete molecules with voids and windows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the structural analysis of porous molecular cages and discrete molecules with voids, capable of characterizing pore sizes and windows in static structures and MD trajectories.

tools.name: molPX
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of MD trajectories along projected coordinates in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: An IPython/Jupyter API for visualizing molecular dynamics trajectories projected onto low-dimensional reaction coordinates or order parameters, facilitating the analysis of conformational changes.

tools.name: MDVoxelSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Voxel-based dynamic cluster analysis of MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories using a voxel-based approach to perform dynamic cluster analysis, useful for studying aggregation and phase separation.

tools.name: genui
tools.one_line_profile: Backend services for molecular generation and QSAR modelling platform
tools.detailed_description: The backend framework for GenUI, providing REST APIs for molecular generation, QSAR modeling, and chemical space visualization, serving as a platform for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: Industrial-Robots-Simscape
tools.one_line_profile: Manipulator and mobile robot models for Simscape simulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB/Simscape models for industrial manipulators and mobile robots, enabling trajectory planning, actuator analysis, and physical simulation.

tools.name: MDToolbox.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for molecular dynamics trajectory analysis and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing a suite of tools for the analysis and modeling of biomolecular MD trajectories, including statistical mechanics analysis methods.

tools.name: MichelaNGLo-app
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from PyMOL PSE to NGL.js web views
tools.detailed_description: A web application and utility to convert PyMOL session files (PSE) or PDB files into NGL.js views, facilitating the web-based sharing and visualization of molecular structures.

tools.name: pycontact
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of non-covalent interactions in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing non-covalent interactions in molecular dynamics trajectories, helping to identify and visualize contact networks and interaction lifetimes.

tools.name: mdtraj
tools.one_line_profile: Open library for the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Python library for reading, writing, and analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories, supporting many file formats and providing fast analysis routines.

tools.name: tftraj
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics trajectory analysis in Tensorflow
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables molecular dynamics trajectory analysis using TensorFlow, allowing for GPU-accelerated computations and integration with machine learning workflows.

tools.name: metgem
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation and visualization of molecular networks based on t-SNE
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the calculation and visualization of molecular networks, utilizing the t-SNE algorithm to map high-dimensional chemical data into visualizable clusters.

tools.name: trackintel
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for spatio-temporal analysis of movement trajectory and mobility data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for the analysis of spatio-temporal movement data, providing methods for processing, clustering, and analyzing human mobility trajectories.

tools.name: dcTMD
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis framework for dissipation-corrected targeted molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for analyzing dissipation-corrected targeted molecular dynamics (dcTMD) simulations, allowing for the estimation of free energy profiles and friction coefficients from non-equilibrium trajectories.

tools.name: SuMD-analyzer
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis scripts for Supervised Molecular Dynamics (SuMD) trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts designed to analyze trajectories generated by Supervised Molecular Dynamics (SuMD) simulations, facilitating the interpretation of enhanced sampling data.

tools.name: MoleView
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight plug-in for 3D molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A fast and lightweight Python-based plug-in for 3D molecular visualization, designed to integrate with molecular modeling workflows.

tools.name: MD-Tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis toolkit for MD and Monte Carlo simulations
tools.detailed_description: A statistical analysis toolkit for molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo simulations, providing utilities for processing trajectory data and calculating physical properties.

tools.name: Mol View Spec
tools.one_line_profile: Standard mechanism for describing molecular visualization states
tools.detailed_description: A generic mechanism and library for describing views and states used in molecular visualizations, enabling interoperability between different visualization tools and web resources.

tools.name: Mol*
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive macromolecular visualization library and viewer
tools.detailed_description: A modern, comprehensive web-based library for visualizing macromolecular structures, widely used in the PDB and other structural biology databases for high-performance rendering.

tools.name: Trajectools
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory data analysis tools for QGIS
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for QGIS that provides tools for analyzing geospatial trajectory data, integrating with the MovingPandas library for processing movement data.

tools.name: wetmsm
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for investigating water dynamics in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing solvent (water) behavior in molecular dynamics trajectories, likely using Markov State Models (MSM) or similar statistical approaches.

tools.name: PySPLIT
tools.one_line_profile: HYSPLIT air parcel trajectory analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating, analyzing, and visualizing air parcel trajectories using the HYSPLIT model, facilitating atmospheric transport and dispersion studies.

tools.name: mdentropy
tools.one_line_profile: Entropy analysis of correlated motions in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to analyze correlated motions in molecular dynamics trajectories and estimate entropy, useful for understanding conformational thermodynamics.

tools.name: SML_CV
tools.one_line_profile: Supervised machine learning for collective variable construction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit using supervised machine learning techniques to construct collective variables (CVs) for accelerated sampling in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: tf_metadynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for enhanced sampling in biophysics
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based implementation for using neural networks to perform enhanced sampling (metadynamics) in computational biophysics simulations.

tools.name: flutterpy
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation of wind-induced flutter effects in structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for post-processing wind tunnel tests or computational simulations to evaluate wind-induced flutter effects and obtain flutter derivatives for structural engineering.

tools.name: RAMAplot
tools.one_line_profile: Ramachandran plot generator for structures and trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Ramachandran plots for single PDB structures and heatmaps for MD trajectories, aiding in the validation of protein backbone conformations.

tools.name: Stmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for molecular rendering
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit component that integrates py3Dmol to render molecular structures within Streamlit web applications, facilitating the creation of interactive scientific dashboards.

tools.name: mdsrv
tools.one_line_profile: Server for streaming MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A web server designed to stream molecular dynamics trajectories to client-side viewers, enabling remote visualization of large simulation datasets.

tools.name: nglview
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that enables interactive viewing of molecular structures and trajectories directly within Jupyter notebooks, using the NGL WebGL library.

tools.name: fluent-automation-tool
tools.one_line_profile: Automation tool for Ansys Fluent simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based automation tool for Ansys Fluent CFD simulations, handling geometry import, meshing, solver setup, and post-processing workflows.

tools.name: ost_pymodules
tools.one_line_profile: Modules for OpenStructure-based molecular analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python modules for advanced analysis of molecular structures and MD trajectories, built upon the OpenStructure software framework.

tools.name: relax
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics analysis by NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A software package for the analysis of molecular dynamics using experimental NMR data, specifically for studying protein dynamics and relaxation.

tools.name: OVITO_python_modifier_db
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Python modifiers for OVITO
tools.detailed_description: A database of Python script modifiers for the OVITO visualization and analysis software, extending its capabilities for atomistic simulation data.

tools.name: VMD-SWTTV
tools.one_line_profile: Signal denoising using Variational Mode Decomposition and Wavelets
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of a denoising framework combining Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) and Stationary Wavelet Transform (SWT) for 1D signal processing.

tools.name: modtox
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing MD trajectories in toxicology
tools.detailed_description: An in silico platform designed to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories using various metrics, clustering, and machine learning techniques, with a focus on toxicology applications.

tools.name: IQmol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular editor and visualization package
tools.detailed_description: An open-source molecular editor and visualization package that allows users to build molecules, set up quantum chemistry calculations (e.g., Q-Chem), and analyze results.

tools.name: NGLVieweR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the NGL.js library, allowing for the visualization and interaction with PDB and structural files within R and Shiny applications.

tools.name: shinyNGLVieweR
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny UI for NGLVieweR
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny application providing a user interface for the NGLVieweR package, simplifying the visualization of molecular structures for R users.

tools.name: nanoreactor_processing
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing for nanoreactor simulations
tools.detailed_description: Code for post-processing computational nanoreactor simulations, likely involving the analysis of reaction networks and molecular dynamics within confined spaces.

tools.name: analyze-md
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for computing physical properties from MD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts for computing various physical properties and performing statistical analysis on trajectories from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: openmm-plumed
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for PLUMED integration
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that interfaces OpenMM with the PLUMED library, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations within OpenMM simulations.

tools.name: DockingPie
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates consensus docking analysis, allowing users to integrate results from multiple docking programs directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: wSterimol
tools.one_line_profile: Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol parameter generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters for conformationally flexible substituents, improving the accuracy of steric descriptors in QSAR studies.

tools.name: mdakit_sasa
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for SASA calculation in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to calculate the Solvent Accessible Surface Area (SASA) of molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for analyzing protein stability and interactions.

tools.name: AeroSandbox
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization and aerodynamics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for aircraft design optimization that leverages automatic differentiation for fast computation, covering aerodynamics, propulsion, structures, and trajectory design.

tools.name: Atomsk
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for manipulating and converting atomic data files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for creating, manipulating, and converting atomic data files for various computational materials science codes (e.g., LAMMPS, VASP, Quantum Espresso).

tools.name: grcarma
tools.one_line_profile: GUI frontend for carma MD analysis software
tools.detailed_description: A Tk-based graphical user interface for the 'carma' molecular dynamics trajectory analysis program, simplifying the usage of carma's analysis features.

tools.name: PLUMED 2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source library for free energy calculations in molecular systems
tools.detailed_description: PLUMED is an open-source library for free energy calculations in molecular systems which works together with some of the most popular molecular dynamics engines. It performs free energy calculations, analyzes trajectories, and biases simulations.

tools.name: Polyhedral Template Matching
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for structural classification in atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Polyhedral Template Matching (PTM) algorithm, which classifies local atomic structures in molecular dynamics simulations by matching against a set of ideal polyhedral templates (e.g., FCC, HCP, BCC, Icosahedral).

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: pyiron is an integrated development environment (IDE) for computational materials science. It provides a workflow management system to combine atomistic codes (like LAMMPS, VASP) with data analysis and visualization tools.

tools.name: PyMod 3
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence analysis and homology modeling
tools.detailed_description: PyMod is a plugin for PyMOL that acts as an interface for various bioinformatics tools (BLAST, ClustalO, MODELLER), allowing users to perform sequence alignments and homology modeling directly within the visualization environment.

tools.name: RDF Calculator
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight code to compute Radial Distribution Functions
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool to calculate the Radial Distribution Function (RDF) from molecular simulation data. It serves as a standalone utility for structural analysis of liquids and amorphous solids.

tools.name: BondPack
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugins for advanced bond visualization
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyMOL plugins designed to enhance the visualization of atomic bonds, providing more control over bond representation in molecular structures.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based ligand binding site prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: P2Rank is a standalone command-line tool that predicts ligand-binding pockets from protein structures using a random forest machine learning model. It is designed for drug discovery and structural biology applications.

tools.name: schrodinger_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for analysis of Desmond MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and utilities for integrating with the Schrödinger software suite, specifically focusing on the analysis of Molecular Dynamics simulations performed with Desmond.

tools.name: Restraintmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating distance restraints for MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: Restraintmaker is a tool (available as a PyMOL plugin or script) to automatically generate position or distance restraints for molecular dynamics simulations. It supports various selection modes and optimization algorithms to distribute restraints.

tools.name: Tracktable
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and rendering of moving object trajectories
tools.detailed_description: Tracktable is a C++ and Python library for the analysis and visualization of trajectory data (moving objects). While general-purpose, it is developed by Sandia National Laboratories for scientific and engineering applications involving spatiotemporal data.

tools.name: VIAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Visual Interactive Analysis of Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: VIAMD is a tool for the visual interactive analysis of molecular dynamics simulations. It allows users to define and visualize properties of the system interactively, facilitating the exploration of complex MD trajectories.

tools.name: PyMOL Open Source
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: The open-source foundation of the PyMOL molecular visualization system. It is widely used for 3D visualization of proteins, small molecules, nucleic acids, and other biomolecules, as well as for producing high-quality publication images.

tools.name: pyMolDyn
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule viewer with cavity computation
tools.detailed_description: pyMolDyn is a visualization tool and library specifically designed for the analysis of cavities, channels, and pockets in molecular structures and dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: vipster
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and editing of periodic molecular structure files
tools.detailed_description: Vipster is a tool for visualizing and editing periodic molecular structures. It supports various file formats and provides features for manipulating atomic coordinates and unit cells.

tools.name: pySW4
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for SW4 seismic wave simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to setup, run, post-process, and visualize numerical simulations for SW4 (Seismic Waves 4th order), a code for simulating seismic wave propagation.

tools.name: VMD_python
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Mode Decomposition implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) algorithm, which is used for signal processing and time-series analysis to decompose a signal into band-limited intrinsic mode functions.

tools.name: postpic
tools.one_line_profile: Particle-in-cell simulation post-processor
tools.detailed_description: Postpic is an open-source Python package for post-processing and analyzing data from Particle-In-Cell (PIC) simulations. It supports various file formats and provides tools for data handling and plotting.

tools.name: MPTRAC
tools.one_line_profile: Massive-Parallel Trajectory Calculations model
tools.detailed_description: MPTRAC is a Lagrangian particle dispersion model designed for the analysis of atmospheric transport processes in the free troposphere and stratosphere. It uses massive parallelism to calculate trajectories for large numbers of particles.

tools.name: pymol_viridis
tools.one_line_profile: Colorblind-friendly palettes for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A plugin/script for PyMOL that adds perceptually uniform and colorblind-friendly colormaps (like Viridis, Magma, Plasma, Inferno) to the visualization environment.

tools.name: PyVibMS
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing vibrations
tools.detailed_description: PyVibMS is a PyMOL plugin designed to visualize vibrational modes in molecules and solids. It allows users to animate and analyze vibrational data from various computational chemistry packages.

tools.name: PSICO
