tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL Script Collection
tools.detailed_description: PSICO (Pymol ScrIpt COllection) is a comprehensive library of Python scripts for PyMOL, extending its functionality with advanced analysis, modeling, and visualization commands.

tools.name: OLIGAMIX
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for tracking oligomerization states and contact networks from MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: OLIGAMIX is a lightweight and extensible analysis tool designed to track oligomerization states and inter-chain contact networks from molecular dynamics (MD) simulation trajectories. It facilitates the characterization of molecular aggregation processes.

tools.name: r3dmol
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing molecular data in 3D using 3Dmol.js
tools.detailed_description: r3dmol provides an R interface to the 3Dmol.js JavaScript library, allowing users to create interactive 3D molecular visualizations directly within R environments, such as RMarkdown and Shiny applications.

tools.name: reax_tools
tools.one_line_profile: High performance ReaxFF/AIMD trajectory analysis tool based on graph theory
tools.detailed_description: reax_tools is a Python-based utility for analyzing trajectories from ReaxFF (Reactive Force Field) or AIMD simulations. It utilizes graph theory to efficiently identify molecules and analyze chemical reactions and species evolution over time.

tools.name: msdanalyzer
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB class for Mean Square Displacement (MSD) analysis of particle trajectories
tools.detailed_description: msdanalyzer is a MATLAB package for analyzing particle tracking data, specifically calculating Mean Square Displacement (MSD) to characterize diffusion and motion types. While widely used in biophysics, it is directly applicable to molecular dynamics trajectory analysis.

tools.name: mddatasetbuilder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build reference datasets for training neural network potentials from LAMMPS trajectories
tools.detailed_description: mddatasetbuilder is a script designed to process LAMMPS molecular dynamics trajectories and convert them into reference datasets suitable for training neural network interatomic potentials.

tools.name: trident-chemwidgets
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter Widgets to interact with molecular datasets and visualize structures
tools.detailed_description: trident-chemwidgets provides a set of Jupyter Widgets that allow users to interactively explore and visualize molecular datasets and chemical structures directly within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: pdbcolor
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to color PDB structures based on external parameters or sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: pdbcolor is a Python utility that modifies PDB files to color atoms or residues based on user-provided data (such as conservation scores or physical parameters) by manipulating the B-factor column, facilitating visualization in standard molecular viewers.

tools.name: PyMOL-Wasm
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly port of the PyMOL molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: A project that ports the PyMOL molecular visualization system to WebAssembly, enabling the running of PyMOL directly in web browsers for molecular structure analysis and visualization without native installation.

tools.name: opstool
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/Post-processing and visualization library for OpenSeesPy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the pre-processing, post-processing, and visualization of finite element analysis data specifically for OpenSeesPy, aiding in structural and geotechnical engineering simulations.

tools.name: MDToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB/Octave toolbox for statistical analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for MATLAB and Octave that provides a collection of functions for the statistical analysis of molecular dynamics (MD) trajectories, including tools for free energy landscape estimation, structural clustering, and dimensionality reduction.

tools.name: MDSuite
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing engine for particle simulations and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A scalable post-processing engine designed for particle simulations, enabling efficient analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories with a focus on calculating transport properties and structural correlations.

tools.name: ZnH5MD
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance interface for H5MD trajectory files
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for reading and writing H5MD (HDF5 for Molecular Dynamics) trajectory files, designed to provide high-performance data access for molecular dynamics analysis pipelines within the Zincware ecosystem.

tools.name: SPaMD
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Parallel Materials/Molecular Design/Dynamics Studio
tools.detailed_description: An integrated software platform for the modeling, simulation, analysis, and visualization of materials at the atomic scale, featuring scalable parallel computing capabilities for large-scale molecular dynamics.
